posts.post_content:
Everyone loves [Magical Trevor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=227222)  
  
'Cause the [tricks that he does](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=220301) are ever so clever  
  
Look at him now, disappearin' a [cow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=121152)  
  
Where is the cow? Hidden right now.

posts.post_content:
I still love her to death. I'm not sure if she's still my favorite blue common yet, but we'll see.  
  
Interesting note: I bounce my own creatures with her more than I bounce my opponent's. I love the combo with [gilded drake](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=gilded drake) and [sun titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=sun titan); reusable [mind control](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=mind control) is just silly.
posts.html:
I still love her to death. I'm not sure if she's still my favorite blue common yet, but we'll see.

Interesting note: I bounce my own creatures with her more than I bounce my opponent's. I love the combo with gilded drake and sun titan; reusable mind control is just silly.

posts.post_content: This plus [Riku of Two Reflections](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Riku of Two Reflections) is really good. Infibounce! (use Riku's second ability to copy it, and have the copy bounce the first one. The first one can still bounce other things) It still costs five per turn but it can be a pretty good makeshift way to temporarily lock down an opponent.

posts.post_content:
I utilize this in my [Venser, the Sojourner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Venser, the Sojourner) deck. Once you trip Vener's ultimate ability you simply have [Aether Adept](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Aether Adept) target itself and cast it 3 times a turn.  
  
Also works with Venser to level up his counters, bounce the adept target their creatures.
posts.html:
I utilize this in my Venser, the Sojourner deck. Once you trip Vener's ultimate ability you simply have Aether Adept target itself and cast it 3 times a turn.

Also works with Venser to level up his counters, bounce the adept target their creatures.
